Activate the Right-To-Left (RTL) reading: Activate the Right-To-Left (RTL) reading layout for the admin area.
Active eCommerce CMS URL. Ex. https:\/\/: Active eCommerce CMS URL. Ex. https://shop.com/
Bættu töf (ms) við svör lánveitunnar. Sjálfgefið er 2000.
Add and manage additional support depart: Add and manage additional support departments.
Add and manage saved replies that can be: Bættu við og stjórnaðu vistuðum svörum sem umboðsmenn geta notað í spjallritlinum. Hægt er að prenta vistuð svör með því að slá inn # og síðan nafn svarsins auk bils. Notaðu \n til að gera línuskil.
Add comma separated WordPress user roles: Add comma separated WordPress user roles. The Support Board administration area will be available for new roles, in addition to the default one: editor, administrator, author.
Add custom fields to the new ticket form: Add custom fields to the new ticket form.
Add custom fields to the user profile de: Add custom fields to the user profile details.
Adjust the chat button position. Values: Adjust the chat button position. Values are in px.
Allow duplicate emails and phone numbers: Allow duplicate emails and phone numbers
Allow only one conversation per user.
Allow registration with an email and a p: Allow registration with an email and a phone number already registered.
Allow the chatbot to reply to the user's: Leyfðu spjallbotni að svara tölvupósti notandans ef svarið er vitað og tölvupóstleiðsla er virk.
Leyfðu spjallbotni að svara textaskilaboðum notandans ef svarið er vitað.
Allow the user to archive a conversation: Leyfa notandanum að setja samtal í geymslu og fela samtöl í geymslu.
Allow users to contact you via their fav: Leyfðu notendum að hafa samband við þig í gegnum uppáhalds skilaboðaforritin sín.
Allow users to select a product on ticke: Leyfa notendum að velja vöru við gerð miða.
Always sort conversations by date in the: Raðaðu samtölum alltaf eftir dagsetningu á stjórnunarsvæðinu.
Append the registration user details to: Append the registration user details to the success message.
Apply a custom background image for the: Apply a custom background image for the header area.
Archive all user channels in the Slack a: Archive all user channels in the Slack app. This operation may take a long time to complete. Important: All of your slack channels will be archived.
Archive automatically the conversations: Archive automatically the conversations marked as read every 24h.
Assign a department to all conversations: Úthlutaðu deild á öll samtöl sem hefjast með Google Business Messages. Sláðu inn auðkenni deildar.
Úthlutaðu deild á öll samtöl sem hófust frá LINE. Sláðu inn auðkenni deildar.
Úthlutaðu deild á öll samtöl sem byrjað er frá Telegram. Sláðu inn auðkenni deildar.
Úthlutaðu deild á öll samtöl sem hófust af Twitter. Sláðu inn auðkenni deildar.
Úthlutaðu deild á öll samtöl sem byrjað er frá Viber. Sláðu inn auðkenni deildar.
Úthlutaðu deild á öll samtöl sem hefjast frá WeChat. Sláðu inn auðkenni deildar.
Úthlutaðu deild á öll samtöl sem byrjað er frá WhatsApp. Sláðu inn auðkenni deildar.
Assign different departments to conversa: Úthlutaðu mismunandi deildum á samtöl sem eru hafin frá mismunandi stöðum Google Business Messages. Þessi stilling hnekkir sjálfgefna deild.
Automatically assigns a department based: Automatically assigns a department based on the user's active plans. Insert -1 as plan ID for users without any plan.
Automatically check and install new upda: Automatically check and install new updates. A valid Envato Purchase Code and valid apps's license keys are required.
Automatically collapse the profile detai: Automatically collapse the profile details panel, and other panels, of the admin area.
Automatically create a department for ea: Automatically create a department for each website and route the conversations of each website to the right department. This setting requires a WordPress Multisite installation.
Automatically send cart reminders to cus: Automatically send cart reminders to customers with products in their carts. You can use the following merge fields and more: {coupon}, {discount_price}, {original_price}, {product_names}, {user_name}.
Automatically sync Zendesk customers wit: Samstilltu Zendesk viðskiptavini sjálfkrafa við Support Board, skoðaðu Zendesk miða eða búðu til nýja án þess að fara frá Support Board.
Automatically synchronize products, cate: Automatically synchronize products, categories, tags, and more with Dialogflow, and enable the bot to answer autonomously to questions related to your shop.
Automatically translate the admin area t: Automatically translate the admin area to match the agent profile language or browser language.
Before initiating the chat, the user mus: Áður en spjallið er hafið verður notandinn að samþykkja persónuverndarskilaboð til að fá aðgang.
Change the chat button image with a cust: Change the chat button image with a custom one.
Change the message text in the header ar: Change the message text in the header area of the chat widget. This text will be replaced by the agent headline once the first reply is sent.
Change the title text in the header area: Change the title text in the header area of the chat widget. This text will be replaced by the agent's name once the first reply is sent.
Check the server configurations and make: Check the server configurations and make sure it has all the requirements.
Choose a background texture for the chat: Choose a background texture for the chat header and conversation area.
Choose where to display the chat. Enter: Veldu hvar á að birta spjallið. Sláðu inn gildin aðskilin með kommum.
Choose which fields to disable from the: Choose which fields to disable from the tickets area.
Choose which fields to include in the ne: Choose which fields to include in the new ticket form.
Choose which optional fields to include: Choose which optional fields to include in the registration form. Name, email, and password fields are all included by default.
Choose which user system the front-end c: Choose which user system the front-end chat will use to register and log in users.
Click the button to start the Dialogflow: Click the button to start the Dialogflow synchronization.
Click the button to start the Messenger: Click the button to start the Messenger synchronization. Localhost cannot and does not receive messages.
Click the button to start the Slack sync: Click the button to start the Slack synchronization. Localhost cannot and does not receive messages. Log in with another account or as a visitor to perform your tests.
Communicate with your users right from S: Communicate with your users right from Slack. Send and receive messages and attachments, use emojis, and much more.
Connect smart chatbots and automate conv: Connect smart chatbots and automate conversations by using one of the most advanced forms of artificial intelligence in the world.
Connect your Telegram bot to Support Boa: Tengdu Telegram botninn þinn við Support Board til að lesa og svara öllum skilaboðum sem send eru til Telegram botninn þinn beint í Support Board.
Connect your Viber bot to Support Board: Tengdu Viber botninn þinn við Support Board til að lesa og svara öllum skilaboðum sem send eru til Viber botninn þinn beint í Support Board.
Create a WordPress user upon registratio: Búðu til WordPress notanda við skráningu.
Delete all leads and all messages and co: Delete all leads and all messages and conversations linked to them.
Disable and hide the chat widget if all: Disable and hide the chat widget if all agents are offline.
Disable and hide the chat widget outside: Disable and hide the chat widget outside of scheduled office hours.
Disable auto-initialization of the chat: Disable auto-initialization of the chat widget. When this setting is active you must initialize the chat widget with a custom JavaScript API code written by you. If the chat doesn't appear and this setting is enabled, disable it.
Disable auto-initialization of the ticke: Disable auto-initialization of the tickets area. When this setting is active you must initialize the tickets area with a custom JavaScript API code written by you. If the tickets area doesn't appear and this setting is enabled, disable it.
Disable features you don't use and impro: Disable features you don't use and improve the chat performance.
Disable file uploading capabilities with: Disable file uploading capabilities within the chat.
Disable the automatic invitation of agen: Disable the automatic invitation of agents to the channels.
Disable the chatbot for the tickets area: Disable the chatbot for the tickets area.
Disable the dashboard, and allow only on: Disable the dashboard, and allow only one conversation per user.
Disable the login and remove the passwor: Disable the login and remove the password field from the registration form.
Display a brand image in the header area: Display a brand image in the header area. This only applies for the 'brand' header type.
Display the articles section in the dash: Display the articles section in the dashboard area.
Display the articles section in the righ: Display the articles section in the right area.
Display the dashboard instead of the cha: Display the dashboard instead of the chat area on initialization.
Display the user full name in the left p: Display the user full name in the left panel instead of the conversation title.
Display the user's profile image within: Display the user's profile image within the chat.
Displays additional columns in the user: Sýnir viðbótardálka í notendatöflunni. Sláðu inn heiti reitanna sem á að bæta við.
Distribute conversations proportionately: Distribute conversations proportionately between agents and notify visitors of their position within the queue. Response time is in minutes. You can use the following merge fields in the message: {position}, {minutes}. They will be replaced by the real values in real-time.
Distribute conversations proportionately between agents, and block an agent from viewing the conversations of the other agents.
Email notifications via cron job: Tilkynningar í tölvupósti í gegnum cron starf
Email piping server information and more: Email piping server information and more settings.
Email template for the notification emai: Tölvupóstsniðmát fyrir tilkynningapóstinn sem er sendur til notanda þegar umboðsmaður svarar. Þú getur notað texta, HTML og eftirfarandi samrunareiti: {conversation_url_parameter}, {recipient_name}, {sender_name}, {sender_profile_image}, {message}, {attachments}.
Enable the chatbot outside of scheduled: Enable the chatbot outside of scheduled office hours only.
Enable the registration only if all agen: Enable the registration only if all agents are offline.
Enable the registration outside of sched: Enable the registration outside of scheduled office hours only.
Enable this option if email notification: Virkjaðu þennan valkost ef tölvupósttilkynningar eru sendar í gegnum cron starf.
Enable ticket and chat support for subsc: Enable ticket and chat support for subscribers only, view member profile details and subscription details in the admin area.
Enter the bot token and click the button: Sláðu inn botnatáknið og smelltu á hnappinn til að samstilla Telegram láni. Localhost getur ekki tekið á móti skilaboðum.
Enter the database details of the Active: Sláðu inn upplýsingar um gagnagrunn Active eCommerce CMS gagnagrunnsins.
Enter the database details of the Martfu: Sláðu inn upplýsingar um gagnagrunn Martfury gagnagrunnsins.
Enter the database details of the Perfex: Sláðu inn upplýsingar um gagnagrunn Perfex gagnagrunnsins.
Enter the database details of the WHMCS: Sláðu inn upplýsingar um gagnagrunn WHMCS gagnagrunnsins.
Enter the default messages used by the c: Sláðu inn sjálfgefna skilaboðin sem spjallbotninn notar þegar spurning notanda krefst kraftmikils svars.
Enter the details of your Google Busines: Sláðu inn upplýsingar um Google viðskiptaskilaboðin þín.
Sláðu inn upplýsingar um Twitter appið þitt.
Enter the details of your WhatsApp Cloud: Sláðu inn upplýsingar um WhatsApp Cloud API reikninginn þinn.
Enter the LINE details to start using it: Sláðu inn LINE upplýsingarnar til að byrja að nota það. Localhost getur ekki tekið á móti skilaboðum.
Enter the URL of a .css file, to load it: Enter the URL of a .css file, to load it automatically in the admin area.
Enter the URL of a .js file, to load it: Enter the URL of a .js file, to load it automatically in the admin area.
Enter the URL of the sources you want to: Sláðu inn slóð heimildanna sem þú vilt þjálfa OpenAI spjallbotninn frá.
Sláðu inn WeChat opinbera reikningslykilinn. Sjá skjölin fyrir frekari upplýsingar.
Enter your 360dialog account settings in: Sláðu inn upplýsingar um 360dialog reikningsstillingar þínar.
Enter your Envato Purchase Code to activ: Enter your Envato Purchase Code to activate automatic updates and unlock all the features.
Enter your Twilio account details. You c: Enter your Twilio account details. You can use text and the following merge fields: {message}, {recipient_name}, {sender_name}, {recipient_email}, {sender_email}, {conversation_url_parameter}.
Enter your Twilio account settings infor: Enter your Twilio account settings information.
Enter your WeChat Official Account infor: Enter your WeChat Official Account information.
Follows a conversation between a human a: Follows a conversation between a human agent and an end user and provide response suggestions to the human agent in real-time.
Follow-up email template. You can use te: Follow-up email template. You can use text, HTML, and the following merge fields and more: {coupon}, {product_names}, {user_name}.
Force the chat to ignore the language pr: Force the chat to ignore the language preferences, and to use always the same language.
Force the loggout of Support Board agent: Force the loggout of Support Board agents if they are not logged in WordPress.
Force users to use a different conversat: Þvingaðu notendur til að nota mismunandi samtal fyrir hverja verslun og fela samtöl frá öðrum verslunum fyrir verslunarstjórum.
Force users to use only one phone countr: Force users to use only one phone country code.
Get it from the APP_KEY value of the fil: Get it from the APP_KEY value of the file .env located in the root directory of Active eCommerce.
Fáðu það frá APP_KEY gildi skráarinnar .env sem staðsett er í rótarskrá Martfury.
Hide chat if no agents online: Hide chat if no agents online
Hide chat outside of office hours: Hide chat outside of office hours
Hide the agent's profile image within th: Hide the agent's profile image within the chat.
Hide tickets from the chat widget and ch: Fela miða frá spjallgræjunni og spjall frá miðasvæðinu.
If no agents respond within the specifie: Ef engir umboðsmenn svara innan tiltekins tímabils verða skilaboð send til að biðja um upplýsingar notandans, svo sem tölvupóstinn hans.
If the chatbot doesn't understand a user: Ef spjallbotninn skilur ekki spurningu notanda, sendir hann samtalið áfram til umboðsmanns.
Import customers into Support Board. Onl: Flytja viðskiptavini inn í Support Board. Aðeins nýir viðskiptavinir verða fluttir inn.
Import vendors into Support Board as age: Flytja söluaðila inn í Support Board sem umboðsmenn. Aðeins nýir söluaðilar verða fluttir inn.
Improve chat performance with Pusher and: Improve chat performance with Pusher and WebSockets. This setting stops all AJAX/HTTP real-time requests that slow down your server and use instead the WebSockets.
Include a profile image field in the reg: Include a profile image field in the registration form to allow a user to upload a profile image.
Include custom fields in the registratio: Include custom fields in the registration form.
Include the last name field in the regis: Include the last name field in the registration form.
Include the password field in the regist: Include the password field in the registration form.
Increase sales and connect you and selle: Increase sales and connect you and sellers with customers in real-time by integrating Active eCommerce with Support Board.
Increase sales, provide better support,: Increase sales, provide better support, and faster solutions, by integrating WooCommerce with Support Board.
Initialize and display the chat widget a: Initialize and display the chat widget and tickets only for members.
Initialize and display the chat widget o: Frumstilla og birta spjallgræjuna aðeins þegar notandinn er skráður inn.
Label: Label
Leave it blank if you don't know what th: Leave it blank if you don't know what this setting is! Entering an incorrect value will break the chat. Sets the main domain where chat is used to enable login and conversations sharing between the main domain and sub domains.
Let the bot search on Google to find ans: Leyfðu botni að leita á Google til að finna svör við spurningum notenda.
Let the bot to search on Google to find: Leyfðu botni að leita á Google til að finna svör við spurningum notenda.
Lets your users reach you via Twitter. R: Gerir notendum þínum kleift að ná í þig í gegnum Twitter. Lestu og svaraðu skilaboðum sem send eru á Twitter reikninginn þinn beint frá Support Board.
Lets your users reach you via WeChat. Re: Gerir notendum þínum kleift að ná í þig í gegnum WeChat. Lestu og svaraðu öllum skilaboðum sem send eru á WeChat opinbera reikninginn þinn beint frá Support Board.
Lets your users reach you via WhatsApp. Read and reply to all messages sent to your WhatsApp Business account directly from Support Board.
Link each agent with the corresponding S: Link each agent with the corresponding Slack user, so when an agent replies via Slack it will be displayed as the assigned agent.
Make a backup of your Dialogflow agent f: Gerðu fyrst öryggisafrit af Dialogflow umboðsmanninum þínum. Þessi aðgerð getur tekið nokkrar mínútur.
Make the registration phone field mandat: Make the registration phone field mandatory.
Members with an active paid plan only: Members with an active paid plan only
Name: Name
Notify the user when their message is se: Látið notanda vita þegar skilaboð hans eru send utan áætlaðs skrifstofutíma eða eða allir umboðsmenn eru ótengdir.
Only questions related to your sources: Aðeins spurningar sem tengjast heimildum þínum
Open the chat window automatically when: Open the chat window automatically when a new message is received.
Play a sound when a user receives an inc: Play a sound when a user receives an incoming message or sends an outgoing message.
Play a sound when an agent receives an i: Spilaðu hljóð þegar umboðsmaður fær móttekin skilaboð eða sendir skilaboð.
Prevent agents from viewing conversation: Prevent agents from viewing conversations assigned to other agents. This setting is automatically enabled if routing or queue is active.
Prevent any abuse from users by limiting: Komdu í veg fyrir misnotkun notenda með því að takmarka fjölda skilaboða sem send eru til spjallbotnsins úr einu tæki.
Protect the tickets area from spam and a: Verndaðu miðasvæðið gegn ruslpósti og misnotkun með Google reCAPTCHA.
Provide help desk support to your custom: Provide help desk support to your customers by including a ticket area, with all chat features included, on any web page in seconds.
Push notifications settings. Enter the P: Push notifications settings. Enter the Pusher Beams details.
Read and reply to messages sent from Goo: Lestu og svaraðu skilaboðum sem send eru frá Google leit, kortum og rásum í eigu vörumerkja beint í Support Board.
Read, manage and reply to all messages s: Read, manage and reply to all messages sent to your Facebook pages and Instagram accounts directly from Support Board.
Redirect the user to the registration li: Redirect the user to the registration link instead of showing the registration form.
Redirect the user to the specified URL i: Redirect the user to the specified URL if the registration is required and the user is not logged in. Leave blank to use the default registration form.
Register all visitors automatically. Whe: Register all visitors automatically. When this option is not active, only the visitors that start a chat will be registered.
Remove the email field from the registra: Remove the email field from the registration form.
Rename the articles archive panel title. Default is 'Help Center'.
Rename the chat bot. Default is 'Bot'.
Rename the visitor name prefix. Default: Rename the visitor name prefix. Default is 'User'.
Replace the admin login page message.
Replace the brand logo on the admin logi: Replace the brand logo on the admin login page.
Replace the header title with the user's: Replace the header title with the user's first name and last name when available.
Replace the top-left brand icon on the a: Replace the top-left brand icon on the admin area and the browser favicon.
Request a valid Envato purchase code for: Biðjið um gildan Envato kaupkóða fyrir skráningu.
Request the user to provide their email: Biddu notanda um að gefa upp netfang sitt og sendu síðan staðfestingarpóst til notandans.
Require the user registration or login b: Require the user registration or login before start a chat. To enable the login area the password field must be included.
Require the user registration or login i: Require the user registration or login in order to use the tickets area.
Rich messages are code snippets that can: Rich messages are code snippets that can be utilized within a chat message. They can contain HTML code and are automatically rendered in the chat. Rich messages can be used with the following syntax: [rich-message-name]. There are a tonne of built-in rich messages to choose from.
Save useful information like user countr: Save useful information like user country and language also for visitors.
Send a message to allow customers to be: Send a message to allow customers to be notified when they can purchase a product they are interested in, but that is currently out of stock. You can use the following merge fields: {user_name}, {product_name}.
Send a message to new users when they cr: Send a message to new users when they create the first ticket. Text formatting and merge fields are supported.
Send a message to new users when they vi: Sendu skilaboð til nýrra notenda þegar þeir heimsækja vefsíðuna í fyrsta skipti.
Send a message to the customer after a p: Send a message to the customer after a product has been removed from the cart. You can use the following merge fields and more: {coupon}, {discount_price}, {original_price}, {product_names}, {user_name}, {purchase_button}.
Send a message to the customers who comp: Send a message to the customers who complete a purchase asking to share the product they just bought. You can use the following merge fields and more: {product_name}, {user_name}.
Send a message to the customers who complete a purchase. You can use the following merge fields and more: {coupon}, {product_names}, {user_name}.
Send a message to the user when the agen: Send a message to the user when the agent archive the conversation.
Send a message to users who visit the we: Send a message to users who visit the website again after at least 24 hours. You can use the following merge fields and more: {coupon}, {user_name}. See the docs for more details.
Send a test agent notification email to: Send a test agent notification email to verify email settings.
Send a test message to your Slack channe: Send a test message to your Slack channel. This only tests the sending functionality of outgoing messages.
Send a test user notification email to v: Send a test user notification email to verify email settings.
Send an email notification to the provid: Sendu tilkynningu í tölvupósti á uppgefið netfang.
Send an email to an agent when a user re: Send an email to an agent when a user replies and the agent is offline. An email is automatically sent to all agents for new conversations.
Send an email to the user when a new con: Sendu tölvupóst til notandans þegar nýtt samtal er búið til.
Sendu tölvupóst til notandans þegar nýtt samtal eða miði er búið til
Send an email to the user when an agent: Send an email to the user when an agent replies and the user is offline.
Send login details to the specified URL: Sendu innskráningarupplýsingar á tilgreinda vefslóð og leyfðu aðeins aðgang ef svarið er jákvætt.
Send the message via the ENTER keyboard: Send the message via the ENTER keyboard button.
Send the user details of the registratio: Sendu notendaupplýsingar skráningareyðublaðsins og sendu rík skilaboð í tölvupósti til Dialogflow.
Send the WhatsApp order details to the U: Sendu WhatsApp pöntunarupplýsingarnar á vefslóðina sem gefin er upp.
Sends a text message if sending of the W: Sends a text message if sending of the WhatsApp message fails. You can use text and the following merge fields: {conversation_url_parameter}, {message}, {recipient_name}, {recipient_email}.
Sends a WhatsApp Template notification i: Sends a WhatsApp Template notification if sending of the WhatsApp message fails. You can use text and the following merge fields: {conversation_url_parameter}, {recipient_name}, {recipient_email}.
Set a dedicated Dialogflow agent for eac: Stilltu sérstakan Dialogflow umboðsmann fyrir hverja deild.
Set a dedicated Slack channel for each d: Stilltu sérstaka Slack rás fyrir hverja deild.
Set a profile image for the chat bot.
Set the avatar image shown next to the m: Stilltu avatarmyndina sem birtist við hlið skilaboðanna. Það verður að vera JPG mynd sem er 1024x1024px með hámarksstærð 50KB.
Set the currency symbol used by your sys: Set the currency symbol used by your system.
Set the default departments for all tick: Set the default departments for all tickets. Enter the department ID.
Set the default email header that will b: Set the default email header that will be prepended to automated emails and direct emails.
Set the default email signature that wil: Set the default email signature that will be appended to automated emails and direct emails.
Set the default form to display if the r: Set the default form to display if the registraion is required.
Set the default name to use for conversa: Set the default name to use for conversations without a name.
Set the default notifications icon. The: Set the default notifications icon. The icon will be used as a profile image if the user doesn't have one.
Set the default office hours for when ag: Set the default office hours for when agents are shown as available. These settings are also used for all other settings that rely on office hours.
Set the default username to use in bot m: Set the default username to use in bot messages and emails when the user doesn't have a name.
Set the maximum height of the tickets pa: Set the maximum height of the tickets panel.
Set the multilingual plugin you're using: Set the multilingual plugin you're using, or leave it disabled if your site uses only one language.
Set the position of the chat widget.
Set the primary color of the chat widget: Set the primary color of the chat widget.
Set the secondary color of the chat widg: Set the secondary color of the chat widget.
Set the tertiary color of the chat widge: Set the tertiary color of the chat widget.
Set the title of the administration area: Set the title of the administration area.
Set the title of the conversations panel: Set the title of the conversations panel.
Set the UTC offset of the office hours t: Set the UTC offset of the office hours timetable. The correct value can be negative, and it's generated automatically once you click this input field, if it's empty.
Stilltu hvaða aðgerðir á að leyfa umboðsmönnum.
Stilltu hvaða aðgerðir á að leyfa umsjónarmönnum.
Set which user details to send to the ma: Stilltu hvaða notandaupplýsingar á að senda á aðalrásina. Bættu við gildum aðskilin með kommum.
Show a browser tab notification when a n: Show a browser tab notification when a new message is received.
Show a desktop notification when a new m: Show a desktop notification when a new message is received.
Show a notification and play a sound whe: Show a notification and play a sound when a new user is online.
Show the agents menu in the dashboard an: Sýndu umboðsmannavalmyndina á mælaborðinu og þvingaðu notandann til að velja umboðsmann til að hefja samtal.
Show the follow up message when a visito: Show the follow up message when a visitor add an item to the cart. The message is sent only if the user has not provided an email yet.
Sýndu lista yfir allar Slack rásir.
Show the profile image of agents and use: Show the profile image of agents and users within the conversation.
Sýndu nafn sendanda í öllum skilaboðum.
Subject: Subject
Subscribe message email template sent to: Subscribe message email template sent to the user when the user communicate the email via the subscribe message form. You can use text, HTML, and the following merge fields: {user_name}, {user_email}.
Subscribe users to your preferred newsle: Subscribe users to your preferred newsletter service when they provide an email.
Subtract the offset value from the heigh: Subtract the offset value from the height value.
Sync admin and staff accounts with Suppo: Sync admin and staff accounts with Support Board. Staff users will be registered as agents, while admins as admins. Only new users will be imported.
Sync all contacts of all clients with Su: Sync all contacts of all clients with Support Board. Only new contacts will be imported.
Sync all users with Support Board. Only: Sync all users with Support Board. Only new users will be imported.
Sync all WordPress users with Support Bo: Sync all WordPress users with Support Board. Only new users will be imported.
Sync knowledge base articles with Suppor: Sync knowledge base articles with Support Board. Only new articles will be imported.
Synchronize customers, enable ticket and: Synchronize customers, enable ticket and chat support for subscribers only, view subscription plans in the admin area.
Synchronize your customers in real-time,: Synchronize your customers in real-time, chat with them and boost their engagement, or provide a better and faster support.
Synchronize your Perfex customers in rea: Synchronize your Perfex customers in real-time and let them contact you via chat! View profile details, proactively engage them, and more.
Template for the email sent to a user wh: Sniðmát fyrir tölvupóstinn sem sendur er til notanda þegar umboðsmaður svarar. Þú getur notað texta, HTML og eftirfarandi samrunareiti: {conversation_url_parameter}, {recipient_name}, {sender_name}, {sender_profile_image}, {message}, {attachments}.
Template for the email sent to an agent: Sniðmát fyrir tölvupóstinn sem sendur er til umboðsmanns þegar notandi sendir ný skilaboð. Þú getur notað texta, HTML og eftirfarandi samrunareiti: {conversation_link}, {recipient_name}, {sender_name}, {sender_profile_image}, {message}, {attachments}.
Template for the email sent to the user: Sniðmát fyrir tölvupóstinn sem sendur er til notanda þegar nýtt samtal er búið til. Þú getur notað texta, HTML og eftirfarandi samrunareiti: {conversation_url_parameter}, {user_name}, {message}, {attachments}, {conversation_id}.

Sniðmát fyrir tölvupóstinn sem sendur er til notanda þegar nýtt samtal eða miði er búið til. Þú getur notað texta, HTML og eftirfarandi samrunareiti: {conversation_url_parameter}, {user_name}, {message}, {attachments}.
Template of the admin notification email: Sniðmát fyrir tilkynningapóst stjórnanda. Þú getur notað texta, HTML og eftirfarandi samrunareit og fleira: {carts}. Sláðu inn tölvupóstinn sem þú vilt senda tilkynningar á í netfangsreitinn.

Template of the second notification emai: Sniðmát fyrir seinni tilkynningapóstinn. Þú getur notað texta, HTML, og eftirfarandi samrunareiti og fleira: {html_products_list}, {coupon}, {discount_price}, {original_price}, {product_names}, {user_name} .
Template of the waiting list notificatio: Sniðmát biðlista tilkynningapósts. Þú getur notað texta, HTML og eftirfarandi sameiningarreit og fleira: {html_product_card}, {product_description}, {product_image}, {product_name}, {product_link}.
